body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Sweet Treats Bakery! My name is Tyler Phillips. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Tyler, my name is Diane Bailey. I have a question about your pricing.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, Diane. I'd be happy to help. What specifically would you like to know about our pricing?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I noticed that the price of your chocolate cake has increased by twenty dollars. That's quite a surprise to me.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your surprise. We've had to adjust our prices due to increased costs from our suppliers. Could I have your email address to offer you a special discount on your next order?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is diane.bailey@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Diane. Could you also provide me with a contact number in case we need to reach you about your order?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my contact number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. Thank you for your understanding and the information, Diane. We appreciate your business and will be in touch with that discount code soon.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Tyler. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your time and have a wonderful day!
